title: Beyond the Horror: Asylum Episode 13
author: MaryGirl Moody
comment: I know I'm late watching this, but I've been re-watching Asylum while waiting on 1984. The scenes between Sister Jude & Kit's children straight up made me ugly cry. The finale was so beautiful & it's one of the reasons Asylum is at the top of the list for me (along with Hotel, Freakshow, Coven, & Apocalypse.) It was just perfection and beautifully written.
What is the most recent stream from Mother Supreme for season 7
Tami! Willowbrook, ooh yes isn't that the same place also in that documentary Cropsey?
sorry i couldn't be here tonight but i shall be here for Wednesday.. as for my theory on the new show.. i think the cult is following twisty.. and the leader is evan hahaha.. is my thoughts.
description:
VIDEO CONTAINS SPOILERS FOR ASYLUM/AMERICAN HORROR STORY!!!

Beyond the Horror: Asylum, is an unofficial American Horror Story Live Review Show. Hosted by MaryGirl Moody, Maisie Andrews, Casey Soper, and Tami Sifford. We discuss and review each episode of American Horror Story Asylum. Join the Freaks of AHS on Facebook and Beyond the Horror on FB.

Please send character names for contest to Casey www.facebook.com/caseythehuman or DM us on Instagram: FreaksofAHS
